data_samples.phonetic_notes: i-reduction in 'osmonida', specific stress on 'lar' in 'bulutlar', short 'a' in 'kuyday'
soft glottal 'h', reduced 'i', velar nasal 'ng' as one unit
unrounded 'o', stress shift in 'bosimingizni', clear 'j' articulation
reduced 'i' in 'keyingi', primary stress on 'o' in 'Paxtakor'
